meanings: (물건을 담는 용기) bowl, container, basin; (접시) dish, plate
be a man of great[high] caliber
be a man of great capacity

vlive.korean: 오케이 끄자, 이제 그릇을... Okay. Let's turn it off. For the plates... 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 댕냥스쿨 EP.7🐶🐱!!!
vlive.english: Okay. Let's turn it off. For the plates...

vlive.korean: [김칫국 그릇을 깨버리셨다...!] 그러게요 나 왜 이리 잘해? [He's broken the Kimchi soup's bowl...!] That's what I'm saying. Why am I so good? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.20
vlive.english: [He's broken the Kimchi soup's bowl...!] That's what I'm saying. Why am I so good?

examples.korean: She scooped ice cream into their bowls. 발음듣기 그녀가 그들의 그릇에 아이스크림을 떠 담아 주었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She scooped ice cream into their bowls. 발음

examples.korean: Can you help me load the dishwasher? 발음듣기 식기 세척기에 그릇들 넣는 것 좀 도와주겠니? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Can you help me load the dishwasher? 발음

examples.korean: The waiter whisked away the plates before we had finished. 발음듣기 우리가 음식을 다 먹기도 전에 웨이터가 접시[그릇]를 휙 가져가 버렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The waiter whisked away the plates before we had finished. 발음

examples.korean: a salad/fruit/sugar, etc. bowl 발음듣기 샐러드 그릇/과일 그릇/설탕통 등 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
a pile of unwashed dishes 발음듣기 씻지 않은 그릇 무더기 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: a pile of unwashed dishes 발음
